page.post_content: Welcome to our Italian restaurant! We offer a cozy and inviting atmosphere with delicious, authentic Italian cuisine. To reserve a table, simply provide us with your preferred date and time and the number of guests at your party. Whether celebrating a special occasion or looking for a night out, we are happy to accommodate your needs. Come join us for an unforgettable Italian dining experience. Reserve your table today! JOIN LA FAMIGLIA and get 7% OFF.
page.content:
Welcome to our Italian restaurant! We offer a cozy and inviting atmosphere with delicious, authentic Italian cuisine.

To reserve a table, simply provide us with your preferred date and time and the number of guests at your party. Whether celebrating a special occasion or looking for a night out, we are happy to accommodate your needs.

Come join us for an unforgettable Italian dining experience.

Reserve your table today!

JOIN LA FAMIGLIA and get 7% OFF.

acf.header_title: Italian Restaurant - Book Now | Criniti's Sydney
acf.header_description: Making a booking at Criniti's | Authentic Italian wood fired pizza and pasta in Sydney, Newcastle and Melbourne. With a range of dishes from steaks & burgers, to fresh seafood & gourmet salads. Lunch, Dinner, Dessert and Cocktails!
acf.header_keywords: pizza, pasta, Italian, Italian cuisine, take away, restaurant, breakfast, lunch, dinner, dessert, coffee, drinks, cocktails, steak, seafood, gluten free, spaghetti, best Italian, birthday dinner, Sydney, Parramatta, darling harbour, darling harbour, castle hill, Newcastle, functions
